content: water balloon designed by holly osterbrink skill level easy finished size approximately 5 high approximately 3 wide materials ● bernat blanket yarn rainbow shine colorway was used in photographed sample ● size k-10 5 6 5mm crochet hook ● yarn needle gauge 5 single_crochet x 5 row = 2 directions note water balloon is worked in a continuous spiral chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook - 6 sts round 2 * 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * around - 12 sts round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st repeat from * around - 18 sts rnds 4-5 single_crochet in each st around - 18 sts round 6 *decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from * twice more - 15 sts round 7 *single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease single_crochet in next st repeat from * twice more - 12 sts round 8 *decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * twice more - 9 sts round 9 *single_crochet in next st decrease repeat from * twice more - 6 sts round 10 single_crochet in each st around - 6 sts round 11 *2 double_crochet in each st around - 12 sts fasten_off and weave in end use soak balloon in water like a sponge and throw abbreviations chain chains repeat repeat round/rnds round/rounds single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches
